titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the City of London, in Common-Councell assembled, presented to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled: with the answer of the Lords to the said petition.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the Honorable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Requesting the release of Charles I and the ending of hostilities.
The same petition as Wing H3545.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
